name: Shattered
summary: Shattered is a first-person game made by developer Devin Eastmond. Inspired by Mark Hadley's Slender: The Eight Pages, it explores genres of horror, fantasy, action, and survival. It follows the experiences of a brave villager who attempts to save his homeland from the threat of nocturnal zombies. When confronted by this menace, will you have courage and continue with the mission, or will you abandon all hope in an attempt to save your own life?
